example_sentence_english: I am waiting for a stroke of luck.

example_sentence_italian: Ho sentito un colpo alla porta.
example_sentence_english: I heard a knock at the door.

example_sentence_italian: Il rumore del colpo mi ha svegliato.
example_sentence_english: The sound of the blow woke me up.
He got used to the blows.

example_sentence_italian: Si è ferito nel colpo finale.
example_sentence_english: He got injured in the final blow.
He lacked precision in the shots.

notes: contraction of su + il; also idiomatic on the spot
example_sentence_english: He understood it on the spot.
He works on the service shots.

example_sentence_italian: Ha chiuso la partita col colpo decisivo.
example_sentence_english: He finished the match with the decisive shot.

example_sentence_italian: Si allena coi colpi ogni giorno.
example_sentence_english: He trains with the shots every day.
